title.value: Consultative engagement of stakeholders toward a roadmap for African language technologies
title.justification: Title is clearly stated multiple times in the provided text.
title.quote: Consultative engagement of stakeholders toward a roadmap for African language technologies

extractions.description: This study investigates the motivations, focus, and challenges faced by stakeholders at the core of the NLP ecosystem in an African context. It identifies core stakeholders through structured interviews and compiles recommendations to enhance the development of language content and technology.

type.justification: The paper employs structured interviews and gathers empirical evidence to derive insights and recommendations.
type.quote: This study investigates the motivations, focus and challenges faced by stakeholders… Interviews with representatives of these stakeholder groups are performed and are collated into relevant themes.

name.justification: The focus of the study is on stakeholders involved in African NLP technologies.
name.quote: There has been a rise in natural language processing (NLP) communities across the African continent…

name.justification: The paper specifically deals with engaging stakeholders to understand and improve the NLP ecosystem.
name.quote: This study describes stakeholders in the African natural language processing (NLP) space

name.justification: The paper discusses the development and implementation of language technologies in Africa.
name.quote: ...interview questions aimed to understand each stakeholder group in the following broad categories: ... the role of language technology in their work processes
